article.headline: Lehigh 61, Bucknell 59
article.story: BETHLEHEM, Pa. -- Marquis Hall scored 13 of his 16 points in the second half, and his off-balance jumper with one second remaining was the game-winner as Lehigh rallied past Bucknell 61-59 Wednesday night. Zahir Carrington had 13 points and 11 rebounds for his sixth double-double of the season. and Rob Keefer added 10 points for Lehigh (13-7, 3-3 Patriot League). Patrick Behan and Justin Castleberry each scored 18 points and Bryan Cohen added 10 for Bucknell (5-15, 2-4). Lehigh faced a nine-point deficit, 30-21, at halftime, and used 14-for-30 shooting in the second half to rally for its third win in four games. Bucknell shot 57 percent (12-for-21) in the first half, but struggled in the second half, going 10-for-26.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
